scripts.watch-src: nodemon --exec 'yarn concurrently --raw "yarn prerender-html" "yarn prerender-js"' --watch pages --watch src
scripts.start: yarn rimraf build && yarn prerender-props && yarn concurrently --raw 'yarn watch-src' 'PORT=8080 http-server build --proxy http://127.0.0.1:8080? --silent'
scripts.restart: yarn concurrently --raw 'yarn watch-src' 'PORT=8080 http-server build --proxy http://127.0.0.1:8080? --silent'
scripts.build: yarn rimraf build && NODE_ENV=production yarn prerender-props && yarn concurrently --raw 'NODE_ENV=production yarn prerender-html' 'NODE_ENV=production yarn prerender-js'
